Global Internet users will double in the next years and most will be mobile.

Invalid DateTime

Global Internet users will double in the next years and most will be mobile. This is one of the facts you'll find in this very good presentation by Business Insider : THE FUTURE OF MOBILE.

This very good presentation give an outlook of what is hapenning and what will happen in mobile market : market growth, OS war, ...
